entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
